data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Herrin, C. Selby, Sage, Richard D. (2012): Description of a new species of Haemogamasus (Mesostigmata, Laelapidae, Haemogamasinae) from Chubut, Rio Negro and Neuquen Provinces, Argentina. ZooKeys 173: 51-77, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.173.1592, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.173.1592
